title: Live pi agent lifecycle integration tests
summary: Created pi-agent-helpers.ts with startPiAgent/stopPiAgent/waitForNode/createTempCwd helpers using tmux sessions. Created lifecycle.test.ts with 4 tests: agent registers on startup, deregisters on /quit, two agents in same cwd both register, proxy returns init_state for live agent. All pass (22s total). Fixed macOS /var â†’ /private/var symlink issue with realpathSync.
